catalyst: The catalyst used in the experiment is Au/La2Sn2O7.
co_catalyst: The co-catalyst used in the experiment is Au (gold).
light source: A 300 W Xe lamp (CEL-S500/350) was utilized as the light source for the photocurrent response behavior test. Additionally, a 125 W high-pressure mercury lamp (GGZ125, Shanghai Yaming Lighting Co, Ltd) was used as the light source for the photocatalytic reactions.
lamp: The lamp used in the experiment is a 300 W Xe lamp (CEL-S500/350).
reaction medium: The reaction medium used in the experiment is CO2 (99.999 purity) introduced into the reactor for 40 minutes to establish an adsorption-desorption balance and provide the necessary reaction gas.
